title: Key figures in Facebook data breach storm speak out
text:
Key figures in Facebook data breach storm speak out   01:52 
The consultancy at the centre of a storm over Facebook data greatly exaggerated its role in Donald Trump's U.S. presidential victory, according to the academic who provided the data. But, as Ciara Lee reports, that's not the view of the whistleblower who helped set up the data analytics firm which targetted Facebook users. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The consultancy at the centre of a storm over Facebook data greatly exaggerated its role in Donald Trump's U.S. presidential victory, according to the academic who provided the data. But, as Ciara Lee reports, that's not the view of the whistleblower who helped set up the data analytics firm which targetted Facebook users.
